body_html:
thanks @llhe

  1. I think the crc check faild just happened a few lines , if so , how to skip the error record? can i just drop it? how ?
  2. "using the python scripts without hadoop-streaming?" you means run the streaming job in a local machine (single node) , just in pipe like cat xxx.dat |python bin/map.py|python bin/reduce.py ?
    I have try this , every thing ok, no error . but the same program running in hadoop failed, I thinks maybe the tfrecords not work well in hdfs ?

thanks @llhe

"using the python scripts without hadoop-streaming?"   you means run the streaming job in a local machine (single node) , just in pipe like cat xxx.dat |python bin/map.py|python bin/reduce.py ?

body:
thanks @llhe 
1)  I think the crc check faild just happened a few lines , if so , how to skip the error record? can i just drop it?  how ?
2) "using the python scripts without hadoop-streaming?"   you means run the streaming job in a local machine (single node) , just in pipe like cat xxx.dat |python bin/map.py|python bin/reduce.py ?
I have try this , every thing ok, no error .   but the same program running in hadoop failed, I thinks maybe the tfrecords not work well in hdfs ?
